items.title: Brigitte Bardot: From French cinema to international fame
items.description: The French model and actress has died at the age of 91.

items.title: Brigitte Bardot: The blonde bombshell who revolutionised cinema in the 1950s
items.description: The cocktail of kittenish charm and continental sensuality who swept away the cinematic cobwebs of the 1950s.

items.title: In pictures: The life and career of Brigitte Bardot
items.description: The French actress redefined cinematic allure, captivating the world before championing animal rights.

items.title: Two killed in Sweden as major storm sweeps across Nordic countries
items.description: Thousands of homes in parts of Finland, Sweden and Norway have been left without power.

items.title: Polls close on first day of Myanmar's widely criticised 'sham' election
items.description: Observers say the vote, accompanied by a renewed crackdown on dissent, is meant to entrench the junta's power.
